title: King of Retail 2
description: Ready to build another empire? You are once again back in the role as the manager, trying to make the best of a busy store. Find the right things to sell, get the right employees and turn every stone for a profit. Can you handle the pressure or will you buck under?
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Go from dream to dynasty in a deeply immersive retail management sim with powerful design tools. Ready to build your empire?
<!--text-->
**King of Retail is back, and it's bigger, better, and more challenging than ever! **

Ready to jump back into the fast-paced world of retail and build your next empire? Let’s do this.

Start with a humble little store and turn it into a bustling hotspot. Hire the right crew, stock the shelves with stuff people actually want, and keep the profits rolling in. But hey, it’s not all smooth sailing—you’ll need to stay sharp, make smart moves, and hustle HARD.

<!--image-->
![King of Retail 2-hhwlg](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6864868718634fea89618483cade47bd/king-of-retail-2-hhwlg.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **YOUR STORE, YOUR RULES**
<!--text-->
Why fit in when you can stand out? Design your store from the ground up—choose the perfect products, deck out your space with eye-catching decor, and create a layout that keeps customers coming back for more. 

Whether you're slashing prices as a discount king or creating an exclusive luxury boutique, every decision shapes your store’s success. Just remember, customer satisfaction is one of the top priorities.

<!--image-->
![King of Retail 2-1yafs](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6864868718634fea89618483cade47bd/king-of-retail-2-1yafs.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **AN EXPANSIVE WORLD TO CONQUER**
<!--text-->
One great store? Bah! How about 20 huge ones? 

Expand your retail empire across the city, conquer new neighborhoods, and adapt to the diverse needs of your customers who range from trend-chasing fashionistas to gadget-hungry tech geeks. 

The city is live with opportunity, but that’s only if you’re bold enough to seize it.

<!--image-->
![King of Retail 2-9cr0u](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6864868718634fea89618483cade47bd/king-of-retail-2-9cr0u.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **THE HEART OF SUCCESS**
<!--text-->
Behind every successful store is a kickin’ team. Hire, train, and lead your staff to retail greatness, keeping them motivated and ready to deliver top-notch service. 

But it’s not just about your employees.

Understanding your customers’ ever-changing desires is also key to turning foot traffic into loyal shoppers. After all, happy people ALWAYS SPEND MORE.

<!--image-->
![King of Retail 2-mvgec](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6864868718634fea89618483cade47bd/king-of-retail-2-mvgec.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **FROM DREAM TO DYNASTY**
<!--text-->
With hard work, following market trends, and making the most of your team, you can expand your operations across the city. Build new outlets for your merchandise and expand your floor space. 

Concepts are a new addition to the series that dies your stores together. Develop new arms of the business, and corner every market imaginable! The only limit is your own ambition!

<!--image-->
![King of Retail 2-1icok](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6864868718634fea89618483cade47bd/king-of-retail-2-1icok.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# **WHAT ELSE IS IN KING OF RETAIL 2?**
<!--text-->
King of Retail 2 is taking retail management to the next level with never-before-seen depth and breadth of gameplay that will pull you fully and completely into the retail experience.

- A fully simulated retail experience, from Corporate HQ down to Point-of-Sale!

- A complex behavioral system for customers and employees, giving them preferences and habits, leading to realistic outcomes in the workplace.

- Customizable Concepts, or unique brands tied to your business. Create your own logos, perfect your style, and diversify your corporate offerings.

- A fully-featured in-game Display Designer. Create custom stands, shelves, refrigeration units, and more. Save and share your designs across the King of Retail community.

- Design, build, and stylize your retail outlets from the ground up. Use attractive exteriors to draw in customers and dream up unique creations that draw their eyes.

<!--image-->
![King of Retail 2-1nvdc](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/6864868718634fea89618483cade47bd/king-of-retail-2-1nvdc.gif)
